getFiles

public static java.util.List<java.io.File> getFiles(java.io.File path,
                                                    java.lang.String identifier,
                                                    boolean isExclude,
                                                    boolean isCaseSensitive,
                                                    boolean isRecursive,
                                                    boolean isFile,
                                                    boolean isDirectory)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
Search in a path (directory) for files via identifier

Parameters:
path - Path
identifier - Part of the file name (if it's "null", all files will be delivered)
isExclude - Is the identifier excluded
isCaseSensitive - true/false
isRecursive - true/false
isFile - true/false
isDirectory - true/false
Returns:
ArrayList containing the path to the matched files
Throws:
java.io.IOException

readStreamFast

public static byte[] readStreamFast(java.io.InputStream in)
                             throws java.io.IOException
Reads a stream in a byte-array. This is a fast method for reading files/resources streams but is probably not suitable for network streams.

Parameters:
in - InputStream
Returns:
byte-array
Throws:
java.io.IOException

readStreamSecure

                               throws java.io.IOException
Reads a stream in a byte-array. This is a slow method for secure reading a stream (e.g. network streams).

Parameters:
in - InputStream

byte-array
